src:
Luego de varios años, Rob Kardashian reaparece junto a sus hermanas; sí bajó de peso
Parece que el consentido del clan ya está listo para volver a figurar en medios de comunicación; la primera vez que lo hizo fue durante el cumpleaños de Kim.

02 Nov 2019, 14:10

Kris Jenner, madre de los hermanos Kardashian-Jenner, aprovechó Halloween para publicar una foto junto a Rob, quien se disfrazó para celebrar Halloween junto a su familia, incluida su hija Dream.
El empresario lució un pantalón verde, camisa azul con un estampado y un chaleco a juego; además, también usó bigote, cejas y pelo fucsia, y llevó su rostro pintado de blanco.



El portal TMZ también compartió una foto de él junto a sus hermanas menores: Kendall y Kylie, en la que celebraron el hecho de que esté nuevamente en el ojo público.
“Rob ha vuelto y luce genial desde lo que parecía un cautiverio autoimpuesto”, detalló el medio.



Cabe mencionar que varios medios aseguraron que su lejanía se debía a que estaba bajando de peso; además, tuvo varios problemas económicos y el fin de su relación con Chyna le dejó secuelas.
Sin embargo, hace algunos meses se rumoró que entre él y Natti Natasha podría haber una relación sentimental, puesto que intercambiaron varios mensajes ‘sospechosos’ en Twitter.
text:
After several years, Rob Kardashian reappears with his sisters; yes he lost weight
It seems that the clan's spouse is ready to appear again in the media; The first time he did it was during Kim's birthday.

02 Nov 2019, 14:10

Kris Jenner, mother of the Kardashian-Jenner brothers, took advantage of Halloween to post a photo with Rob, who dressed up to celebrate Halloween with his family, including his daughter Dream.
The businessman wore green pants, blue shirt with a print and a matching vest; in addition, he also used a mustache, eyebrows and fuchsia hair, and wore his face painted white.



The TMZ portal also shared a photo of him with his younger sisters: Kendall and Kylie, in which they celebrated the fact that he is again in the public eye.
"Rob is back and he looks great from what seemed like a self-imposed captivity," he said.



It is worth mentioning that several media assured that his remoteness was due to the fact that he was losing weight; In addition, he had several economic problems and the end of his relationship with Chyna left him sequels.
However, some months ago it was rumored that between him and Natti Natasha there could be a sentimental relationship, since they exchanged several suspicious ’messages on Twitter.
